data: The organization Global Manufacturing Inc is a company specializing in the manufacturing of automotive and aerospace components.
The organization Global Manufacturing Inc is a multinational industrial giant with 50 plants worldwide.
The organization Global Manufacturing Inc is based in Detroit, Michigan, USA.
The organization Global Manufacturing Inc was founded in 1952.
The organization Global Manufacturing Inc is committed to integrity, excellence, and sustainability.
The organization Global Manufacturing Inc delivers precision-engineered products that drive innovation in transportation.
